title: Chiropractic Health Center - Chiropractor in Shawnee, OK US
description: Chiropractic Health Center is your local Chiropractor in Shawnee serving all of your needs. Call us today at 405-273-6822 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Carrie Smith, LMT, RN, graduated from massage school in May 1988. She has worked in Tulsa, OK; part-time and full-time positions over the last 31 years. She graduated from nursing school in 2009 and worked in various nursing positions, including: Labor & Delivery; Day Patient at Heart Hospital South; and over 5 years of Public Health Nursing in Shawnee and Seminole. She is a certified Infant Massage USA Instructor and offers classes to instruct caretakers how to massage their infants, one year and under, at different venues throughout the year. She uses Young Living Essential oils in her practice, and supports the use of organic products in her massage. She offers therapeutic, ethical massage, adjusting pressure for the individual. She offers relaxing massage, lymphatic work, deep tissue, sports type massage, raindrop technique, and Swedish styles of massage. She believes in the power of nurturing touch and enjoys helping people of all ages.
